title: Medical Image Generation
description: Developing advanced deep learning algorithms such as diffusion models and flow matching for generating synthetic medical images and videos to augment datasets, improve model training, and enhance diagnostic capabilities.

title: Medical Image Interpretation
description: Using advanced deep learning techniques to interpret complex medical images, enhancing diagnostic capabilities and clinical decision-making.

title: Federated Learning in Medical Imaging
description: Implementing federated learning approaches to train models on distributed medical imaging data while preserving patient privacy and data security.

title: Resource-efficient Medical Imaging
description: Developing lightweight and efficient models for medical imaging tasks to enable deployment on resource-constrained devices, ensuring accessibility in diverse healthcare settings.

title: Medical Imaging Data Privacy
description: Implementing advanced techniques to ensure the privacy and security of medical imaging data, including encryption, anonymization, and secure data sharing protocols.

title: LLMs and VLMs in Medical Imaging
description: Exploring the integration of large language models (LLMs) and vision-language models (VLMs) in medical imaging tasks, enhancing the understanding and interpretation of complex medical data.
